page.title: 12VILLAGE HALL & ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: there is an excellent village hall in milland opened in 1971 replacing an older one. there is an even newer one ar rake replacing one burnt down in 1982. redford has a small hall built in 1958 replacing the church room. the milland evangelical church has a meeting room,and milland sports club a well used club room in its pavilion. entertainments would mostly take place in the village halls. rake has a drama group which presents an annual play. milland entertains its old people with visiting groups and amateur concerts as well as talks and lectures organised by such as the horticultural society. a harvest supper is held in october, and schools put on their christmas plays. apart from this there is plenty of socialising in private houses.
